PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02852025-03-05GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAmendments to Appendices I, II and III of the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of Canada, the Amendments to Appendices I and II of the CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL TRADE IN ENDANGERED SPECIES OF WILD FAUNA AND FLORA, adopted at Panama City, from November 14 to 25, 2022, and the Amendments to Appendix III of the CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL TRADE IN ENDANGERED SPECIES OF WILD FAUNA AND FLORA, notified on November 16, 2020, March 24, 2021, March 15, 2022, March 24, 2022, October 13, 2022, November 3, 2022, November 25, 2022, February 3, 2023, and February 20, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of Canada, the Amendments to Appendices I and II of the CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL TRADE IN ENDANGERED SPECIES OF WILD FAUNA AND FLORA, adopted at Panama City, from November 14 to 25, 2022, and the Amendments to Appendix III of the CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL TRADE IN ENDANGERED SPECIES OF WILD FAUNA AND FLORA, notified on November 16, 2020, March 24, 2021, March 15, 2022, March 24, 2022, October 13, 2022, November 3, 2022, November 25, 2022, February 3, 2023, and February 20, 2023.
